oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Groundbreaking for Hadley Park Towers, 1968
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph taken at the groundbreaking ceremony for Hadley Park Towers (Project Tenn. 5-19), 31 October 1968. Located on John A. Merritt Boulevard, the 100-unit high rise building was constructed as a public housing project for the elderly. Pictured in the photograph are Rep. Richard Fulton and Mayor Beverly Briley. Photographed by William M. King of the Metropolitan Government of Nashville & Davidson County. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Fulton, Richard, 1927-2018; Briley, Beverly, 1914-1980
